section.name: Overview
section.p: This service uses a background thread to monitor the Component Configuration File. If a change is detected the Avalon container is reconfigured.
This service allows reconfiguration support without using client/server communication.

subsection.name: Role Configuration
subsection.source: <role name="org.apache.fulcrum.yaafi.service.reconfiguration.ReconfigurationService" shorthand="ReconfigurationService" default-class="org.apache.fulcrum.yaafi.service.reconfiguration.ReconfigurationServiceImpl" early-init="true" description="Monitors the componentConfiguration.xml to reconfigure YAAFI" />
